name: Draggin' Ducks
description:
Mouse-Only controls!

Drag ducks to central squares to move. Drag them onto enemies to attack. Drag them onto other ducks for a c-c-c-combo attack!

These three heroes joined together to fight off the evil bombers:

REDBLADE: The leader! His red blade makes his combo attacks extra sharp, cutting through two layers of bomber!

BLUEBOOTS: The muscle! He may be slow but watch him go, cutting through two layers with his basic attack!

GREENBEAK: The socially awkward one! He can use his speed to take more actions and generate tons of points!
